Description: Failure to maintain access platforms on the gantry of an overhead crane. The access platform gave way during maintenance activities, resulting in a fall of approximately eight metres that caused fatal injuries.
Offence Date: This case did result from the investigation of a fatality
Region: Cleveland House/Cleveland BridCleveland Bridge UK LimitedCleveland HouseYarm RoadDARLINGTONDL1 4DEEngland
